message.content:
Here is a sample healthy meal plan that avoids dairy, garlic, almonds, and cashews:

Breakfast:
- Oatmeal with fresh fruits (apples, bananas, strawberries, blueberries) topped with walnuts and chia seeds. You can sweeten it with maple syrup or agave nectar instead of honey.
- A side of scrambled eggs with spinach and turkey bacon

Lunch:
- Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, carrots, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing
- A side of grilled chicken breast

Dinner:
- Baked salmon with steamed broccoli and roasted sweet potatoes
- For dessert, have some fresh fruit salad (oranges, pears, kiwis)

Snacks:
- Hummus with carrot sticks or celery
- A handful of raisins for a quick energy boost

This meal plan is balanced in terms of macronutrients and offers a variety of flavors and textures. It includes whole grains (oatmeal, protein from eggs and chicken, healthy fats from walnuts, vegetables, and antioxidants from fruits. The hummus provides plant-based protein and fiber. Raisins are a good source of natural sugar for energy.
